title: I cannot make posts in other boards.
body:
Riot, the boards are broken for me. I cannot make threads in other sections of the boards because I am getting gated by a level 7 or higher restriction, when I am level 30! Please help me. 

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Hey if this is still an issue, use the [Profile Syncing Tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) to fix things up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wskg9NxA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T17:05:28.604+0000)
>
> Hey if this is still an issue, use the [Profile Syncing Tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) to fix things up.

Hi, yes, I used it and it worked like a charm. Thanks Porocles. 

{{sticker:katarina-love}}
